title: Why Steve jobs is famous? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me give you some highlights of his life because of why he is famous visionary idol inspiration Picasso and many more for people like us. He was 17 when he got convinced how computer will change the world while working with woz. It is his pure driving force why they built Blue box and later founded Apple along with others in his garage. He was 25 when he pushed the computer industry by putting Personal computer(pc era) for masses as a tool, as a bicycle of mind, as an expression of human liberal art. Apple Lisa Macintosh. He was 30 when ousted from his own company. He didn't stop and went on investing building on powerful computers and other fields wherever he saw technology playing pivotal role in human lives. Next Pixar Disney. He was 42 when he returned to Apple to prove that he was right about products and people more than anyone in the 20th century. iMac iTunes iPhone iPad. His weight on design people spirituality craftsmanship art innovation lives on. His success and his stints influenced more than one industries. You can literally touch and feel all of these what he truly believed in every computer and devices. He is one of them who will be remembered in time. Calling him famous would be inappropriate because fame and people are temporary in the world but spirit isn't.

two things: seeing what could be long before others, recognizing the importance of interface and having high standards for his products. In many respects, he was the users’ best friend in terms of helping people without tech skills get the most out of computing. We could really use another (dozen) guys like that. That, and Pixar. Forget Apple. Forget GUIs. This guy knew what computers could do for animation a decade before others did.
